message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $60, you take $40.  It's important to reach a deal quickly!
Alice, your offer wasn't unreasonable given the circumstances, but it heavily favored you. Let's try to be a little more equitable. This offer reflects that we both lose if we don't make a deal.
Bob, time is ticking and we both lose if we don't compromise. I'll meet you in the middle - let's split the difference from our previous offers.
Alice, this is a fair deal. We're running out of time, and splitting the money evenly ensures we both walk away with something substantial. Let's not let greed get the better of us.
